name: XWUI Input Group Component
description: Input group component that wraps an input with prefix and suffix elements. Supports left/right addons for icons, buttons, or other elements. Useful for creating inputs with icons, currency symbols, or action buttons.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the input group

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

prefix.description: Prefix element or HTML string to display before the input

suffix.description: Suffix element or HTML string to display after the input

leftAddon.description: Left addon element or HTML string

rightAddon.description: Right addon element or HTML string
